page.title: 05Health care in Bramley_part2
page.content: { Mrs.Wadsworth told us about what {happens if the Health Centre cannot {cope}When you first go in Hospital the first person you see is a Consultant, or a Specialist. In the Hospital there are a lot of jobs for Nurses to do and these are two of them: making beds and feeding patients. A Physiotherapist is a person that gives us exercises. A man who pushs patients to an operating theatre on a trolley is called a Porter.{The National Health Scheme {started in 1948 .}The special photos are called an Xray. Mrs Wadsworth was in Hospital and she had to have an Xray so they gave her a drink and she called it Strawberry Milk Shake and they took an X_ray. Laboratories test blood and swabs. A person called a Surgeon does the operation. Psychologists sort out peoples behaviour.
